commit message:
For search contact queries (used in sms, contact, alias...), we first try on the name matches only.
If no result is return, we try on the whole fields (address, email...)

Fixes Issue 334
Fixing camera issue (at least for Android version >= HoneyComb 11)

Adding 'test implementation' for the Smack exception management.
Reducing reply timeout to 20s.
Adding last connection date

Adding new notifier on setting updated.
Using this implementation in the Connection Tab

Add a setting to configure the ping interval
Defaut value set to 600s = 10 min
For some ISP the value must be set to 2 min
First XMPP connection retry will be done immediately

Adding new command 'video'
Camera settings not yet managed.
On unpasable packet, only log a error
Using TextUtil.Split instead of doing it manually
Fix reconnection issue with null message on login exception
